active_learning.discussion_prompt: In an organization facing high false positive rates in suspicious activity detection, debate whether increasing SAR filing volume improves security or burdens compliance. Propose 2-3 alternative metrics (e.g., SAR quality score, detection rate) and justify using FFIEC Appendix S or NIST SP 800-55 frameworks. Consider trade-offs and share real-world examples.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

distractor_protocol.step: Identify common misconceptions about the topic
Ensure distractors are similar in length and complexity
Include partial truths that require deeper understanding

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in Suspicious Activity Reporting (SAR) Metrics (Topic Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Security And Risk Management > Security Awareness and Training > Measurement, Evaluation, and Improvement > Metrics and Reporting > Suspicious Activity Reporting Metrics). Voter consensus: 100% approval on pedagogy, completeness, etc. Research Context: SARs are reports to FinCEN for suspicious transactions (money laundering, fraud). Key metrics: SAR volume per period, % alerts to SARs, avg time to file, false positive rate, SAR quality score, regulatory feedback. Frameworks: FFIEC BSA/AML Appendix S (customer ID, transaction monitoring: https://bsaaml.ffiec.gov/manual/Appendices/20); NIST SP 800-55 Rev. 1 (select measures, baselines, analyze/report: https://nvlpubs.nist.gov/nistpubs/Legacy/SP/nistspecialpublication800-55r1.pdf); FinCEN SAR guidance (https://www.fincen.gov/resources/statutes-regulations/guidance). Incorporate these pedagogical elements: - Learning Objectives: [INSERT FULL LIST FROM ABOVE] - Active Learning: [INSERT FULL DETAILS FROM ABOVE] - Scaffolding: 4 Layers [INSERT FULL DETAILS FROM ABOVE] - Prior knowledge: Link to KPIs, incident reporting. Generate 50 high-quality flashcards using the exact Flashcard Schema: [INSERT FULL SCHEMA FROM ABOVE]. Balance: 20% REMEMBER/UNDERSTAND, 30% APPLY/ANALYZE, 30% EVALUATE, 20% CREATE; even across layers. Ensure university-level rigor (Bloom's progression, active recall). Output as markdown list: **Card 1** Front: ... | Back: ... No other text.
